project.title: Merch Program Proposal
project.subtitle: We help brands launch and grow merchandise—without the headaches, guesswork, or wasted spend.

cover.headline: Kickstart Your Eco-Friendly Merch Line with Sarah Chen Creative
cover.subhead: Transform your Instagram influence into revenue with sustainable products

problem.title: Most merch fails for the same reasons.
problem.body: No strategy. Designs that look nice but don't sell. Production chaos. Marketing that never really launches.
bullets: No clear strategy — just "let's try merch"
Design that looks good but doesn't convert

solution.title: We don't just make products. We build merch systems that work.
solution.body: Strategy, design, production, and growth—handled by one team so your merch becomes a revenue stream (not a side project).
bullets: Launch an eco-friendly merch line with t-shirts and tote bags
Leverage your Instagram audience to boost revenue
Align your brand with sustainability and eco-conscious living
Create a foundation for future merch initiatives

packages.title: The Launch tier is perfect for first-time merch programs like yours, allowing you to introduce up to 5 eco-friendly products while capitalizing on your strong Instagram presence.

items.name: LAUNCH
items.tagline: Everything you need to start merch properly.
bullets: Help deciding what products to sell
Design for your first merch items
A clear plan for how to launch

items.name: GROWTH

items.name: SCALE
items.tagline: Turn merch into a real business.

scope.title: Clear boundaries = faster approvals.
left: Design assistance for t-shirts and tote bags
Production of up to 5 initial products

scope.footerNote: Anything outside scope can be added as an add-on (so budget stays controlled).

items.q: How will eco-friendly materials impact my brand?
items.a: Using sustainable materials reinforces your brand's commitment to sustainability, appealing to eco-conscious consumers.

nextSteps.title: If you're ready to do it properly, we should talk.
